questions.question: What is the main objective of the final project in this course?
choices: To learn a new programming language
To apply learned concepts to a real-world problem in Timor-Leste
To write a research paper on Python
questions.answer: To apply learned concepts to a real-world problem in Timor-Leste

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a suggested project idea?
choices: An app to track local market prices
An educational game about Timorese culture
A social media platform for Timor-Leste
questions.answer: A social media platform for Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the recommended group size for the final project?
questions.answer: 3-4 members

questions.question: What is the definition of a Minimum Viable Product (MVP)?
choices: A fully-featured product ready for market
A version of a product with just enough features to be usable by early customers
The final version of a product after years of development
questions.answer: A version of a product with just enough features to be usable by early customers

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a key component of project management?
questions.answer: Outsourcing

questions.question: What is Agile Development?
choices: A rigid, structured approach to software development
An iterative approach emphasizing flexibility and collaboration
A method of developing software without any planning
A technique for writing code faster
questions.answer: An iterative approach emphasizing flexibility and collaboration

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a basic Git command?
questions.answer: git delete

questions.question: What is the purpose of user stories in project planning?
choices: To define features from the user's perspective
questions.answer: To define features from the user's perspective

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a required resource for the course?
questions.answer: Smartphone

questions.question: What is the recommended text for the course?
choices: Think Python by Allen B. Downey
questions.answer: Think Python by Allen B. Downey

questions.question: Which of the following is suggested as a way to gain practical experience?
choices: Participating in a 'code for good' hackathon
questions.answer: Participating in a 'code for good' hackathon

questions.question: What is the purpose of inviting local tech professionals to give guest lectures?
choices: To offer real-world insights and experiences
questions.answer: To offer real-world insights and experiences

questions.question: Which online resource is mentioned for additional Python learning?
questions.answer: Codecademy

questions.question: What is the purpose of the individual reflection paper in the final project?
choices: To reflect on the project experience and learnings
questions.answer: To reflect on the project experience and learnings

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a topic in the final project unit?
questions.answer: Advanced algorithms

questions.question: What is the recommended length for the final project presentation?
questions.answer: 10-15 minutes

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT part of the final project deliverables?
questions.answer: Marketing plan

questions.question: What percentage of the final project grade is allocated to functionality?
Which Python library is recommended for GUI development in the final project?
questions.answer: Tkinter

questions.question: What is the purpose of using version control (e.g., Git) in the project?
choices: To make the project more complicated
To track changes and facilitate collaboration
questions.answer: To track changes and facilitate collaboration

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a potential challenge in project implementation?
questions.answer: Language barriers

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for breaking down a large project?
choices: Divide it into smaller, manageable tasks
Assign the entire project to one team member
Wait until the last minute and rush
questions.answer: Divide it into smaller, manageable tasks

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a key principle of Agile Development?
choices: Individuals and interactions over processes and tools
Following a strict plan over responding to change
questions.answer: Following a strict plan over responding to change

questions.question: What is the purpose of creating a product backlog in project management?
choices: To prioritize and track pending tasks and features
To assign blame for project delays
questions.answer: To prioritize and track pending tasks and features

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a best practice for code organization?
choices: Writing all code in a single file
questions.answer: Writing all code in a single file

questions.question: What is the recommended structure for the final project presentation?
questions.answer: Introduction, Body, Conclusion

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a demo best practice?
choices: Have a backup plan for technical issues
questions.answer: Improvise the entire demo

questions.question: What is the purpose of the user manual deliverable in the final project?
choices: To provide instructions on how to use the program
To showcase the team's writing skills
To replace the need for a good user interface
questions.answer: To provide instructions on how to use the program

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a grading criterion for the final project?
questions.answer: Number of lines of code

questions.question: What is the purpose of incorporating error handling in the final project?
choices: To improve the robustness and user experience of the program
questions.answer: To improve the robustness and user experience of the program
